lines.text: declare long longs len , pos , i
declare character array s of size 1000
while read len , pos is true
if pos is greater than len / 2
for i = 0 to len - pos exclusive , print " RIGHT " , newline
lines.code: for ( i = 0 ; i < ( len - pos ) ; i ++ ) cout << " RIGHT " << endl ;

lines.text: for i = len - 2 to 0 inclusive , print " LEFT " and " PRINT " and s [ i ] and newline
lines.code: for ( i = len - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { cout << " LEFT " << endl << " PRINT " << s [ i ] << endl ; }

lines.text: for i = 1 to pos exclusive , print " LEFT " , newline
lines.code: for ( i = 1 ; i < pos ; i ++ ) cout << " LEFT " << endl ;

lines.text: for i = 1 to len exclusive , print " RIGHT " , newline , " PRINT " , s [ i ] , newline
lines.code: for ( i = 1 ; i < len ; i ++ ) { cout << " RIGHT " << endl << " PRINT " << s [ i ] << endl ; }
